not_finded_information_block.title: Didn't Find What You Were Looking For?

faqItems.question: What is a Virtual Server (VDS/VPS)?
faqItems.answerDescription: A Virtual Dedicated (Private) Server is a virtual service that emulates the functioning of a real physical server. We provide full root access for each server, while each client has an individual restricted space that does not interact with 'server neighbors' due to KVM technology. Note that we do not classify VDS and VPS as different services. All our virtual servers fall into both categories.
